content:
News from Belgium today (sorry, in Dutch but google can help).
Insurance doctors can see Medical Records when they work at the same hospital or care team.
https://www.nieuwsblad.be/cnt/dmf20200123_04817886

My perspective: the fact they can see the records is not the issue. The problem is "what for".
Role-based permissions will fall too short imo
Hospitals must track what data is ised/shared, and what for.
